items.sentence: When the accountant was arrested, rumour had it that it was for his creative bookkeeping.
The young man who has not wept is a savage, and the old man who will not laugh is a fool.
You can adduce studies and reports all you like, but their sophistry will always win out.
Mary put a note in Tom's lunchbox telling him not to forget to buy bread on his way home.
Tom decided to go on a hunger strike until his parents agreed to let him go to the party.
